= Source code =

== PHP ==
{{{
<?php
echo '<p>Hello World</p>';
}}}

== Node JS ==
File `hello-world.js`:
{{{
var sys = require('sys'),
http = require('http');

http.createServer(function(req, res) {
  res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'text/html'});
  res.write('<p>Hello World</p>');
  res.end();
}).listen(8080);
}}}

Run:
{{{
node hello-world.js
}}}
